game.name: PAYDAY 2: Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페이데이 갱이 샌프란시스코에서 새 무기를 구입할 수 있는 연줄을 만듭니다. The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack에는 산탄총, 아킴보로 사용이 가능한 기관단총과 권총, 9개의 개조부품, 20개의 무기 색상이 들어있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Payday Gang has a new contact in San Francisco for buying guns. The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack includes a shotgun, an SMG and a pistol (with akimbo options for the latter two), along with 9 mods and 20 weapon colors.
